data.text: @JPBWFarm Thanks for suggestion, but shifted to the IPCC ClimateReport press conference. Can fill you in later if you like.
@CllrJonOlson Binge watch in peace while you still can!!
@CllrJonOlson Get well soon Jon, hope the rest of your family remain negative. Highly recommend the Taskmaster youtube channel if want some free humourous content
@CllrJonOlson Take it easy. Glad you are on the mend.
